mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.qyxx_ref_owid AS "qyxxRefOwid", a.job_ref_owid AS "jobRefOwid", a.yh_ref_owid AS "yhRefOwid", a.bmlx AS "bmlx", a.bmdx AS "bmdx", a.bmsj AS "bmsj", a.zwbh AS "zwbh", a.lxdh AS "lxdh", a.lxr AS "lxr", a.qymc AS "qymc", a.qysh AS "qysh", a.xjhsqly AS "xjhsqly", a.sfxz AS "sfxz", a.xjsj AS "xjsj", a.sftz AS "sftz", a.tzsj AS "tzsj", a.jkr AS "jkr", a.jkrjs AS "jkrjs", a.memo AS "memo", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.xgfj AS "xgfj", a.zdytj1 AS "zdytj1", a.zdytj2 AS "zdytj2", a.zdytj3 AS "zdytj3", a.zdytj4 AS "zdytj4", a.zdytj5 AS "zdytj5", a.tjsd1 AS "tjsd1", a.tjsd2 AS "tjsd2", a.tjsd3 AS "tjsd3", a.tjsd4 AS "tjsd4", a.tjsd5 AS "tjsd5", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_jybm( owid, qyxx_ref_owid, job_ref_owid, yh_ref_owid, bmlx, bmdx, bmsj, zwbh, lxdh, lxr, qymc, qysh, xjhsqly, sfxz, xjsj, sftz, tzsj, jkr, jkrjs, memo, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, xgfj, zdytj1, zdytj2, zdytj3, zdytj4, zdytj5, tjsd1, tjsd2, tjsd3, tjsd4, tjsd5, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{qyxxRefOwid}, #{jobRefOwid}, #{yhRefOwid}, #{bmlx}, #{bmdx}, #{bmsj}, #{zwbh}, #{lxdh}, #{lxr}, #{qymc}, #{qysh}, #{xjhsqly}, #{sfxz}, #{xjsj}, #{sftz}, #{tzsj}, #{jkr}, #{jkrjs}, #{memo}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{xgfj}, #{zdytj1}, #{zdytj2}, #{zdytj3}, #{zdytj4}, #{zdytj5}, #{tjsd1}, #{tjsd2}, #{tjsd3}, #{tjsd4}, #{tjsd5}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_jybm SET owid = #{owid}, qyxx_ref_owid = #{qyxxRefOwid}, job_ref_owid = #{jobRefOwid}, yh_ref_owid = #{yhRefOwid}, bmlx = #{bmlx}, bmdx = #{bmdx}, bmsj = #{bmsj}, zwbh = #{zwbh}, lxdh = #{lxdh}, lxr = #{lxr}, qymc = #{qymc}, qysh = #{qysh}, xjhsqly = #{xjhsqly}, sfxz = #{sfxz}, xjsj = #{xjsj}, sftz = #{sftz}, tzsj = #{tzsj}, jkr = #{jkr}, jkrjs = #{jkrjs}, zdytj1 =#{zdytj1}, zdytj2 =#{zdytj2}, zdytj3 =#{zdytj3}, zdytj4 =#{zdytj4}, zdytj5 =#{zdytj5}, tjsd1 =#{tjsd1}, tjsd2 =#{tjsd2}, tjsd3 =#{tjsd3}, tjsd4 =#{tjsd4}, tjsd5 =#{tjsd5}, memo = #{memo}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, xgfj = #{xgfj}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select:
select
from bckj_biz_jybm a where a.JOB_REF_OWID =#{jobRefOwid} and a.YH_REF_OWID=#{yhRefOwid}
